document.masterDocTitle: A revision of Western Palaearctic Medon. VII. A new species from southern Turkey and additional records (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of Western Palaearctic Medon. VII. A new species from southern Turkey and additional records (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae)

C o m m e n t: This species is distributed in northern Iran and Azerbaijan , near the coast of the Caspian Sea (Map 5). Unlike
M. fusculoides
, which too is widespread and common in Iran and which was predominantly found near streams and rivers,
M. sparsiventris
appears to inhabit the leaf litter layer of forests.

Map 5 : Distribution of
Medon sparsiventris EPPELSHEIM
, based on revised records.
